FuncDef: The display dldp command displays DLDP status globally or on a specific interface. The display dldp command displays DLDP status globally or on a specific interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays DLDP information on a specified interface.
-

ExtraInfo:
To view DLDP status, run the display dldp command to display DLDP status globally or on a specific interface.
If no parameter is specified, information about DLDP status on all DLDP-enabled interfaces on a device is displayed.
